data.actual_result: "Ask {username} for a new invite!" sentence gets pushed behind the Mention button
data.expected_result: Username cuts off to allow the full sentence to appear on the invite or perhaps move the Mention button slightly up
data.short_description: Long usernames push text behind the Mention button on expired invites
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a user with a long username (Example: IsTheCakeALieOrTheActualTruth?) post an invite - Delete it in Server Settings > Invites - Click "Join" or refresh your client so it appears as expired and observe the bottom sentence
